[h1] Плюсы Portal [/h1]
Я познакомился с игрой начиная с 2‐й части этой серии и обе игры мне очень понравились за:
1. Классную идею игры
2. Физическую составляющую
3. Забавные шутки и подколы
4. Сюжет поверхностный и скрытый
5. Графику
6. Босс файт
[spoiler]7. головоломОчКу[/spoiler]
8. Цену
Возможно я забыл что-то важное, но если что, то дополню. Перейдем к минусам
[h1] Минусы Portal [/h1]
1. Явные проблемы с озвучкой, которая режет уши, прерывается не закончив фразу, говорит не те фразы, так же присутствуют кривые переводы.
2. Малое кол-во геймплэя примерно на 2ч. (дальше будут усложненные уровни, которыми являются уровни из компании)
3. Мне нравятся головоломки, где нужно подумать и тут их маловато, в основном уровни легкие и требуют скорости действий, нежили тактики

Very short game and kind of outdated. Very easy to run on low end PCs at least. Not necessarily bad, but I wouldn't buy it except if you're getting it with the Portal 2 bundle. Portal 2 is a far better execution of this game's concept and while I don't quite recommend this game I would recommend its sequel to just about anyone. Great concept but just doesn't feel polished enough.

The Portal series has always been a gem from Valve since 2007. Even though it defers from Valve's usual shoot 'em up formula, It is a solid game with decently challenging puzzles and nice mechanics. I like it when companies defer from their usual formula and try something new, It earns them some respect from me and even more if it is executed well, and this is one of the more well executed ones. Pick it up when you have the money, you will not regret it.

Bon jeu , certes court ( environ 4 heures pour finir l'histoire) mais avec un gameplay intéressant : les portails , les tourelles ... etc. 
L'univers est assez mystérieux (on ne connaît pas grand-chose de ce qui est arrivé à notre personnage et comment elle s'est retrouvée là...) mais aussi sombre .
Le jeu vous fera travailler votre matière grise sur certaines phases mais il reste assez simple .
Jeu culte à essayer sans hésitation .

5 puanı oyunun kısa olmasından kırdım.
Size çok iyi bir deneyim yaşatacağı şüphesiz. Son saati half life aksiyonu ilk saatleri beyin yoran testleri , inanılmaz iyi level dizaynı ,hikayesi ve hala daha kötü gözükmeyen grafikleri ile eşsiz bir yolculuktu. İndirimde 3 tl gibi bir fiyata aldım. Resmen bedava sayılır. 20 tl ye 2 saat pahalı gibi bu yüzden 10 tl altına düşmesini bekleyin. 
Bu oyunun yerini doldurabilecek tek oyun portal 2 dir. Bu tarzda bu kadar iyi bir oyun bulamazsınız. Valve farkı :)

Portal is a 2007 puzzle-platform game made by Valve. The game consists of a bunch of different puzzles that slowly gets harder and harder as you process through the game. You are given the "Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device" or "The Portal Gun." To help you complete the puzzles.

Игра действительно хорошая, но есть пару минусов:
1. Игра очень сильно зависает, и зависает довольно таки часто. А так же главы долго загружаются. (Пункт 1 проверял на пк и ноуте, и что там, что там, зависало и загружалось одинаково долго - где то 1 - 2 минуты.)
2. Главы с 1 по 9 очень легкие, их было очень просто пройти.
Но, я все же советую вам в неё по играть, вы не пожалеете.
Всем спасибо за внимание!

Portal, ufak bir hikayesi bulunan bir bulmaca oyunu ve bulmacaları çözmesi gerçekten çok zevkli bulmacaların zorlukları gayet iyi ayarlanmış zaman içerisinde bir laboratuvar faresi olduğunuzu hissettiriyor. Eğer oyunu beğendiyseniz, daha fazla bölümü olsun ve Aperture'da neler oluyor bilmek istiyorsanız  2. oyuna da bakmanızı tavsiye ediyorum :)

This game is very short. You can complete it´s story in 5 hours. But this game is A LOT of fun. It´s worth the price to pay for a game with an original and revolutionary gameplay and brilliant level design, with realistic enough physics and a surprising art style and graphics for it´s time. It´s major problem is it´s duration, but it is indeed a must-have for your collection. Also the price is very low in comparison to all the impact and influence the game had.

[h1] A Teleporting Puzzle Experience [/h1]
[i] "Welcome to Aperture Science~" [/i]

Portal is a game where you solve puzzles, go through obstacles, and fly like a Kiwi bird using your portal gun, it seems short but worth playing through, each chamber teaches you about the use of portals, by bringing boxes from one place to another, to fly fast and high. 

[b] Overall [/b]
It helps you improve your puzzle-solving skills, the story is fine, the music is great, totally worth trying out.
